mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORYNAME,CATEGORYNO FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORYLEVEL = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AUCTIONITEM A JOIN CATEGORY C ON(A.CATEGORYNO = C.CATEGORYNO) JOIN AUCTIONDETAIL D ON (A.ITEMNO = D.ITEMNO) WHERE C.UPPERCATEGORYNO =#{i} AND D.STARTDAY = SYSDATE

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AUCTIONITEM A JOIN CATEGORY C ON(A.CATEGORYNO = C.CATEGORYNO) JOIN AUCTIONDETAIL D ON (A.ITEMNO = D.ITEMNO) WHERE C.UPPERCATEGORYNO =#{i} AND D.STARTDAY BETWEEN SYSDATE-7 AND SYSDATE

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AUCTIONITEM A JOIN CATEGORY C ON(A.CATEGORYNO = C.CATEGORYNO) JOIN AUCTIONDETAIL D ON (A.ITEMNO = D.ITEMNO) WHERE C.UPPERCATEGORYNO =#{i} AND D.STARTDAY BETWEEN SYSDATE-30 AND SYSDATE

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AUCTIONITEM A JOIN CATEGORY C ON(A.CATEGORYNO = C.CATEGORYNO) JOIN AUCTIONDETAIL D ON (A.ITEMNO = D.ITEMNO) WHERE C.UPPERCATEGORYNO =#{i} AND D.STARTDAY BETWEEN SYSDATE-365 AND SYSDATE

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AUCTIONITEM A JOIN CATEGORY C ON(A.CATEGORYNO = C.CATEGORYNO) JOIN AUCTIONDETAIL D ON (A.ITEMNO = D.ITEMNO) WHERE C.UPPERCATEGORYNO =#{i} AND A.STARTPRICE BETWEEN 1000 AND 10000 AND D.STARTDAY = SYSDATE

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AUCTIONITEM A JOIN CATEGORY C ON(A.CATEGORYNO = C.CATEGORYNO) JOIN AUCTIONDETAIL D ON (A.ITEMNO = D.ITEMNO) WHERE C.UPPERCATEGORYNO =#{i} AND A.STARTPRICE BETWEEN 10001 AND 100000 AND D.STARTDAY = SYSDATE
